sources.name: Movies1
sources.script:
source(output(
		movieId as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Movies1

sources.name: Movies2
sources.script:
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Movies2

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1

transformations.name: Join1
transformations.script:
Movies1, Movies2 join(Movies1@title == Movies2@title,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'both')~> Join1

transformations.name: Select1
transformations.script:
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		movieId,
		movie,
		title = Movies2@title,
		genres = Movies2@genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		{Rotton Tomato}
	))~> Select1
